amendment.description: Page 3, line 14, strike "The transactions" and insert the following: "(1) IN GENERAL- The transactions". Page 3, line 19, strike "(1)" and insert "(A)" and adjust the margin 2 ems to the right. ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-401 to amend the bill to not allow the exemption to be available for those who have been disqualified under the "bad actor" disqualification standard of section 230.506(d) of title 17, Code of Federal Regulations, providing an additional layer of investor protection in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Emmer amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment and the bill pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Emmer.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Emmer amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Emmer amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
